name: vidsec
label: VidSec
description: Picking a frame from a video by second

props.name: second
props.label: Second
props.description: The time to snap a frame from the video

name: vidSlice
label: Vid Slice
description: Picking a frame by dividing the video into slices and then pick the slice

props.name: numberofslices
props.label: Number Of Slices
props.description: Number of slices to split the video

props.name: sliceNumber
props.label: Slice Number
props.description: Number of slice out of slices

props.name: startSec
props.label: Start Sec
props.description: The second (or part of second) to begin extracting the slices stripe from (e.g. to avoid black frame in videos that begin with fade to black, set start_sec to the second that is after the black transition).

props.name: endSec
props.label: End Sec
props.description: The second (or part of second) to stop extracting slices at (e.g. to create a stripe animation that is smooth but only contains few frames, use this parameter to only extract a short segment of your video instead of extracting slices across the entire video

name: vidStrip
label: VidStrip
description: Splitting the video into slices and glue them into one image

props.name: numberofslices
props.label: Number Of Slices
props.description: the number of slices to split the video

props.name: startSec
props.label: Start Sec
props.description: The second (or part of second) to begin extracting the slices stripe from (e.g. to avoid black frame in videos that begin with fade to black, set start_sec to the second that is after the black transition).

props.name: endSec
props.label: End Sec
props.description: The second (or part of second) to stop extracting slices at (e.g. to create a stripe animation that is smooth but only contains few frames, use this parameter to only extract a short segment of your video instead of extracting slices across the entire video
